insert into sys_dept (parent_id, dept_name, order_num, leader, phone, email, `status`, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, remark ) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update sys_dept set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leader = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dept_id, parent_id, dept_name, order_num, leader, phone, email, `status`, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, remark from sys_dept where dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
